code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant Prov as Provider System
    participant Intake as Intake Service
    participant Rules as Rule Engine
    participant RAG as RAG Service
    participant CLF as Predictive Model
    participant Fuse as Fusion
    participant Expl as Explanation Builder
    participant Rev as Reviewer App
    participant Ledger as Decision Ledger

    Prov->>Intake: Submit PA + clinical docs
    Intake->>Rules: Evaluate policy criteria(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    Intake->>RAG: Retrieve policy snippets + draft necessity
    Intake->>CLF: Predict approval probability
    Rules-->>Fuse: rule hits/misses
    RAG-->>Fuse: grounded rationale w/ citations
    CLF-->>Fuse: score + top factors
    Fuse-->Expl: composite decision context
    Expl-->>Rev: Explanation Packet + checklist
    Rev->>Ledger: Store packet (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
